ml.alternet.security.auth

Interface CryptFormatter<T extends CryptParts>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Concrete crypt parts.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Argon2CryptFormatter, BCryptFormatter, ColonCryptFormatter, CurlyBracesCryptFormatter, CurlyBracesCryptFormatterWrapper, IterativeSaltedCurlyBracesCryptFormatter, MD5ModularCryptFormatter, PBKDF2ModularCryptFormatter, PlainTextCryptFormatter, SaltedCurlyBracesCryptFormatter, SaltedModularCryptFormatter, SaltlessModularCryptFormatter, SHA2ModularCryptFormatter, UnixCryptFormatter, UnixMD5CryptFormatter

    public interface CryptFormatter<T extends CryptParts>
    Bridge between the string representation of a crypt and its parts.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format(T parts)
      Format crypt parts to a crypt string.
      CryptFormat getCryptFormat()
      The general format of this formatter.
      T parse(String crypt, Hasher hr)
      Breakdown a crypt to its parts.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        T parse(String crypt,
        Hasher hr)
        Breakdown a crypt to its parts. Parsers can parse a partial crypt, in order for example to extract the salt.
        Parameters:
        crypt - The crypt string to parse.
        hr - The hasher that can process the crypt ; also hold the configuration such as the byte encoder.
        Returns:
        The crypt parts of the given crypt.

      • format

        String format(T parts)
        Format crypt parts to a crypt string.
        Parameters:
        parts - The crypt parts to format.
        Returns:
        The formatted crypt.

      • getCryptFormat

        CryptFormat getCryptFormat()
        The general format of this formatter.
        Returns:
        The crypt format family.
